statements: SELECT * FROM SocialMediaAdvertisingCampaignPerformance;
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM SocialMediaAdvertisingCampaignPerformance;
SELECT conversion_rate, campaign_id FROM SocialMediaAdvertisingCampaignPerformance;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM SocialMediaAdvertisingCampaignPerformance WHERE click_through_rate > 5;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaAdvertisingCampaignPerformance WHERE conversion_rate < 2;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaAdvertisingCampaignPerformance ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM SocialMediaAdvertisingCampaignPerformance WHERE click_through_rate > 0.05;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM SocialMediaAdvertisingCampaignPerformance WHERE conversion_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaAdvertisingCampaignPerformance WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Spring%' OR campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM SocialMediaAdvertisingCampaignPerformance;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM SocialMediaCampaigns;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaCampaigns WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM SocialMediaCampaigns ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, date, clicks, conversions FROM CampaignMetrics WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM CampaignMetrics WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM SocialMediaCampaigns WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaCampaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%summer%'
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM CampaignMetrics GROUP BY campaign_id
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate, conversion_rate, date, clicks, conversions FROM SocialMediaCampaigns JOIN CampaignMetrics ON SocialMediaCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignMetrics.campaign_id
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM SocialMediaCampaigns WHERE conversion_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM social_media_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT click_id, click_date, click_count FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_count > 100;
SELECT conversion_id, click_id, conversion_date FROM conversion_metrics WHERE conversion_count >= 10 ORDER BY conversion_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM social_media_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.click_id, c.click_date, cm.conversion_count FROM click_through_rates c JOIN conversion_metrics cm ON c.click_id = cm.click_id;
SELECT cm.conversion_id, c.campaign_id, cm.conversion_date FROM conversion_metrics cm JOIN click_through_rates c ON cm.click_id = c.click_id ORDER BY cm.conversion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT click_id, campaign_id, click_time FROM click_through_rates ORDER BY click_time DESC;
SELECT conversion_id, campaign_id, conversion_time, user_id FROM conversion_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_time FROM social_media_campaigns INNER JOIN conversion_metrics ON social_media_campaigns.campaign_id = conversion_metrics.campaign_id;
SELECT u.username, c.click_time, cm.conversion_time FROM users AS u JOIN click_through_rates AS c ON u.user_id = c.user_id JOIN conversion_metrics AS cm ON u.user_id = cm.user_id;

SELECT campaign_name, SUM(campaign_id) AS total_clicks FROM social_media_campaigns JOIN click_through_rates ON social_media_campaigns.campaign_id = click_through_rates.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT ac.campaign_name, cc.click_count, cm.conversion_count FROM advertising_campaigns ac JOIN click_through_rates cc ON ac.campaign_id = cc.campaign_id JOIN conversion_metrics cm ON ac.campaign_id = cm.campaign_id;
SELECT sa.account_id, sa.account_name, aa.account_type FROM social_media_accounts sa JOIN advertising_accounts aa ON sa.account_id = aa.social_media_account_id ORDER BY aa.account_type ASC;
